basics.name: Tommy Lee
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software engineer with over 4 years of experience with backend web development. Experienced with developing the full stack web applications on Linux environments.

work.summary: Built web and mobile applications in a small (2-4) consultancy.
highlights: Primary engineer for Child Care services client. Developed reports and integrations to connect SQL Server client data warehouse with intranet tools.
Finished a calculator app built in Objective C.
Migrated large Ruby on Rails project from Rails 3.2 to Rails 4.2
Developed migration strategies for legacy PHP projects to be compatible with PHP 5.6.x
Built a copyright and brand search tool using Angular 1.5.x.

work.summary: Built Web applications with PHP MVC Frameworks like CodeIgniter and FuelPHP. Built mobile applications using PhoneGap. Created and modified sites built on Wordpress.
highlights: Integrated time-tracking software with in-house project management system. Saved 2 hours of time-tracking each pay period.
Migrated dedicated server infrastructure to a virtualized KVM environments on Centos and Debian servers.

volunteer.summary: Rebuilt website and setup forms and pages for Regional Event held at UCF. Occasional content management.
highlights: Nominated for SPS Award for Outstanding Student
